overview:
Co-founder and managing partner of Earlybird

More than 17 years experience as investor and entrepreneur; focus on web-enabled services and e-commerce

Most successful exits: Tipp24 (IPO Prime Standard FSE: TIM); Interhyp (IPO Prime Standard FSE: IYP), Trade Sale BridgeCo to SMSC (NASDAQ: SMSC) Board member of Crowdpark, Lumics, madvertise, Smava, and Yoom

Co-founder and managing partner of SMB Industrieholding Wildau and DH Industrieholding Hohenthurm; consultant for McKinsey & Company

Dipl.Wi-Ing. (Msc equivalent), Technical University of Hamburg, PhD, University of St. Gallen
